quest.name: Special Delivery
journal:
 Quest Sync
Asgeir is confused by what he found in the woods.
objectives: Deliver the pristine crate to Asgeir.

dialogue.name: ASGEIR
dialogue.text: I was out gathering lumber the other day when out of nowhere an arrow came whistling past my head. It wasn't until I regained my composure that I realized a letter had been tied to it.

dialogue.name: ASGEIR
dialogue.text: Or rather, a map, which had a location not far from here marked on it.

dialogue.name: ASGEIR
dialogue.text: It's likely a trap, but I suspect whatever danger may be lying in waiting will prove little trouble for a guest of Master Matoya. If you should find anything there, be it treasure or something else, I would gladly share it with you.

dialogue.name: ASGEIR
dialogue.text: I know not where the map came from, but I'm curious to see what you find.

dialogue.name: ASGEIR
dialogue.text: Ah, you are returned. Did you find anything?

dialogue.name: ASGEIR
dialogue.text:
A crate...?
It's filled with staves and bows. <gasp> It couldn't be...

dialogue.name: ASGEIR
dialogue.text: A number of weapons were stolen from our storehouse but a few days past. We tracked them as far as we could, but their trail went cold at the border to Yx'Maja.

dialogue.name: ASGEIR
dialogue.text: Do you suppose the keepers of Yx'Maja placed the crate there?

dialogue.name: ASGEIR
dialogue.text: At any rate, we are grateful to have our weapons returned to us, though I can't imagine you would have need of them. But you must be compensated for your troubles. Here─this is for you.
